[quote=“reyx7, post:58, topic:329335”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=425721.msg3162326#msg3162326 date=1269693908]

Very nice, you posted every single detail about it:) id lower the stats just a bit more, and tehn make it more money depending how easy it is for money in the encomy. Then id bump up the credits some more, a picture importing as model base? would be like 5% to ea same with ints, also nice for posting specils, and its a little long.
[/quote] thx for ur feedback rep++

rep++ for some feedback? kinda a waste…
Plus he gravedigs ancient topics…[/quote]indeed rep++ for some feedback, this was the best feedback i had this year from moparscape, 80% of the occasion they say its good, its awesome or it sucks but they never mention why, i gotta say there are people that do mention what they like and dislike but there are only a few of those kind

EDIT: btw, he didn’t grave dig an old topic, this is just a month old, it was a sticky thats why it has so many views
